attributes.action: STOP AND CLOSE DOWN HALAL SLAUGHTER IN UNITED KINGDOM - MAKE THIS ILLEGAL
attributes.additional_details: HALAL SLAUGHTER IS NOT A HUMAIN SLAUGHTER OF ANIMALS AND CAUSES GREAT PAIN AND SUFFERING
attributes.background: HALAL SLAUGHTER SHOULD BE STOPPED AND CLOSED DOWN IN UNITED KINGDOM AS IT IS NOT HUMAIN TO ANIMALS AND NOT A HUMAIN WAY TO SLAUGHTER - THIS SHOULD BE MADE AN ILLEGAL PRACTISE
